text.autoconfig.tooltiptoggles.title: TooltipToggles
text.autoconfig.tooltiptoggles.option.hi: Hides the "# components" tooltip on enchanted or modified items.
Hides the item's Minecraft ID tooltip.
text.autoconfig.tooltiptoggles.option.so: Sorts the armor attribute (e.g. Armor Toughness, Knockback Resistance) tooltips alphabetically.
